reviewText: We watch a lot of Thomas, and this one is a good addition to our holiday collection.  Very fun ... my son would highly recommend this! :)
Title: N/A

reviewText: What is Christmas without Thomas & Friends?  "Thomas & Friends: A Very Thomas Christmas" is a wholesome and classic Christmas DVD full of all the classic trains my boys love.  The lessons are simple for kids to pick up such as working together, responsibility and the importance of friends!  There are four episodes on this DVD all about snow or Christmas!  With the new CGI animation the colors are bright and the trains are animated.  This is a perfect DVD for any train lover, and I have a feeling we will be watching this well into summer.
Title: N/A

reviewText: This is a collection of several (somewhat) related episodes of the "Thomas & Friends" TV show. Total running time is about 45 minutes, but that includes several intro and outro title sequences. My grandson has heard those songs so many times from watching these collections that he sings them as he's walking around pretending to be a steam engine.This is a great collection to watch as Christmas is fast approaching, but true Thomas fans (like my grandson) will enjoy it any time of the year.If you have a child in your home who loves Thomas & Friends as much as my grandson, these videos are perfect. Being able to stream them free is more than worth the cost of the Prime membership...we watch at least one of these per day.
summary: Collection of Thomas & Friends Christmas-themed episodes

reviewText: There isn't a way to play only the episodes. The quality and stories are fine for dvd and super cute plots, but my sons hate the driver yakking it up so much so I end up having to be more hands on than I really want to. My kids favorite is the Emily story! :)
